testcase.name: to check login functionality with valid creditionals
testcase.system-out: Given the user should be in facebook home page..............................passed When the user fills the valid login creditionals in username and password field.passed And click the login button..................................................passed Then the user should navigate to the home page..............................passed

testcase.name: to check login functionality with invalid creditionals
testcase.system-out: Given the user should be in facebook home page..............................passed When the user fills the invalid login creditionals in username and password field.passed And click the login button..................................................passed Then the user should navigate to the invalid page...........................passed
